title: Was Officer Nakia Jones fired after the publication of a video of the Verral Proteitite police?
subtitle: Nakia Jones said that the Warnesville Heights Police Department fired her after she made a video shoot in July 2016 after Alton Sterling's death in Baton Rouge, Louisiana.
author: Kim LaCapria
vclaim: Officer Nakia Jones was expelled after expressing her thoughts about police brutality in a live video on the viral Facebook.
